INVALID_ENUM: {property} should be in one of the following values: {enumValues}
MIN: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be at least {constraints.0}
MAX: {property} with value: "{value}" needs to be less than {constraints.0}
MIN_LENGTH: {property} should have minimum length of {constraints.0} characters
MAX_LENGTH: {property} should not exceed the maximum length of {constraints.0} characters
MIN_ITEMS: {property} length should have minimum length of {constraints.0} items
MAX_ITEMS: {property} length should not exceed the maximum length of {constraints.0} items
